detail_desc: Fitted, knee-length lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned velour. Concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Round-necked top in ribbed jersey made from a soft cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, covered buttons at the top, two elasticated seams at the waist and decorative ties at the sides of the hem.
Short, fitted dress in smocked cotton jersey with a square neckline and a small frill trim at the top. Short sleeves with broderie anglaise, and a small frill trim at the hem. Unlined.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. High collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.
Straight-cut jacket in imitation suede with faux shearling lining and a collar with a tab and metal buckle underneath to make it a stand-up collar. Zip down the front and pockets in the side seams.

Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with elastication and a second layer of fabric at the top with short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the at the waist and a long slit at the hem.

Small, round bag in quilted imitation leather. Space for one bank card, a zip at the top and a carabiner hook at the back. Narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Diameter approx. 10 cm. Depth 1.5 cm.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frills at the top that continue over the shoulder straps and down the back. Seam at the waist.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a wrapover with a frill trim down the front and to the hem. Seam at the waist with ties at the sides and long puff sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with concealed press-studs at the top, a jersey-lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shimmering jumpsuit with a deep V-neck, wrapover top and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and wide, straight legs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details, a padded, detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, two inner pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support with decorative gathers. No fasteners.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless dresses in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button. Side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a decorative bow at the front. Lined gusset.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Fitted, cropped top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, and an elastic hem with a text print.
Top in soft velour with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, ribbed turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric-covered hair elastics with a bow.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Bikini briefs in soft modal jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Tunic in crisp cotton poplin with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam under the bust and at the hem for added width.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in an airy weave with wide 3/4-length sleeves and long fringes at the hem. No fasteners.

Top in stretch cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Non-padded, underwired bra in mesh with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long coat in pile with narrow notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a smocked yoke and round neckline with a frilled collar and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Voluminous, elbow-length puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim at the hems and gathers at the shoulders.
Elasticated scrunchies in a pleated weave.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded jacket and pair of trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, two-part kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons at the top and a gently rounded hem.

No-show trainer socks in a fine, fast-drying, functional knit. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ribbed section over the foot and a concealed silicone trim at the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft, rib knit with an elasticated, drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Straight-style maxi dress in ribbed, softly draping jersey with a V-neck front and back, and tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the top.
Tie in jacquard-weave satin. Width 5.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft embroidered knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Negligee in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an opening and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.

Long parka in a cotton weave with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a drawstring hood. Zip and wind-flap with concealed press-studs, dropped shoulders, sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs and a single back vent. Unlined.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and adjustable hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Thong briefs in jersey and lace with a mid, V-shaped waist and lined gusset.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper in a soft loose knit containing some mohair with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Pointelle sections at the front and down the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clip with a glittery decoration at the top and hair extensions. Length approx. 34 cm.
Wide shirt in a soft, patterned weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, wide sleeves with a wide cuff and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Ribbed top in an airy viscose blend with a V-neck, lacing at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Fitted strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Mesh dress with a glitter print, wide shoulder straps and a decorative wrapover at the top. Press-studs and a detachable bow at the back, a seam at the top and a pleated skirt with a double lining for extra width. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.

Ankle-length jeans in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs. Fake fly and fake button, and a jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
